# shadcn-svelte Documentation for LLMs

> shadcn-svelte is a port of shadcn/ui for Svelte.

This site provides documentation in a format optimized for Large Language Models, with each page available as a clean markdown file.

## Complete Documentation

- [Complete documentation](https://shadcn-svelte.com/docs/llms.txt): The complete shadcn-svelte documentation including all general content, components, type helpers, and utilities

## General

- [About Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/about/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for About
- [Changelog Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/changelog/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Changelog
- [Cli Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/cli/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Cli
- [Components Json Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/components-json/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Components Json
- [Components Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/components/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Components
- [Dark Mode Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/dark-mode/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Dark Mode
- [Index Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/index/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Index
- [Installation Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/installation/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Installation
- [Javascript Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/javascript/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Javascript
- [Legacy Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/legacy/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Legacy
- [Migration Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/migration/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Migration
- [Registry Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/registry/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Registry
- [Theming Documentation](https://bits-ui.com/docs/theming/llms.txt): Detailed documentation for Theming
